fallbackNotice: 目前暂以英文内容呈现，完整翻译即将补上。
title: Meet the bilingual coaches behind SustainSage
description: We bring supervision-informed coaching, policy literacy, and multilingual lived experience to every partnership.

members.name: Maggie Lin
members.title: ICF PCC Coach & Co-founder
members.bio: Maggie designs trauma-informed coaching containers for founders, sustainability leaders, and policy teams navigating uncertainty.

members.name: Sarah Chen
members.title: Career Transitions Coach
members.bio: Sarah supports mission-driven professionals as they move between sectors, stewarding ethical risk assessments and pacing change experiments.

members.name: Jonas Wu
members.title: Systems & Strategy Coach
members.bio: Jonas partners with cross-border teams to align governance, stakeholder engagement, and data care so decisions stay grounded in shared context.
